name: artorize-cdn
description: CDN site for Artorize - AI art protection system

scripts.build:test: tsc src/test.ts --outDir dist --module ES2015 --target ES2016 --lib ES2016,DOM --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:embed: tsc src/embed.ts --outDir dist --module none --target ES2016 --lib ES2016,DOM --skipLibCheck
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:test && npm run build:embed
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build:all && npm run test
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run deploy:build && node scripts/deploy.js staging
scripts.deploy:production: npm run deploy:build && node scripts/deploy.js production
